# [Interview #390: Brandon Sanderson's Blog: Big Wheel of Time Interview Retrospective, Entry #15](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=390#15)

#### Question

And now, just for fun:
  
Who's nastier: Moridin, or Padan Fain?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Still Moridin, by a long shot.
